I

index - Static variable in class controller.K3
index is an int used to keep in the memory the choice of the player on one panel.
indexMemoryParOne(int) - Method in class controller.K3
This function set index.
indexMemoryParTwo(int) - Method in class controller.K3
This function set index.
init() - Method in class view.UI
This function initialise screen.
initBaseTilePlayer() - Static method in class controller.K3
This function generate 3 by 3 tiles for each players for 5 time each, then 2 by 2 for each players for 1 time each.
initGame() - Static method in class controller.K3
This function sets the game according to the parameter chosen by the player(s).
initGamePanel() - Method in class view.UI
This function initialise gamePanel.
initIntroPanel() - Method in class view.UI
This function initialise the intro panel.

This function initialise the side pyramid if the K3 is full.
initSidePyramid(boolean) - Method in class game.Pyramid
This function is the first time when the pyramid is full.
initTiles() - Static method in class controller.K3
This function fill tiles with 9 tiles from each usual color.
introPanel - Variable in class view.UI
introPanel is the JPanel that contains the intro menu.

This function say if the player is an AI.

This function test if the tile at the given coordinate is approachable.

isFinish is a boolean that is true if one of the player can not play anymore.
